content: Verdant Glow's Spirit allows you to turn into a small sapling and slowly regain Health. If you activate tree-mode in water, you gain even more Health. The equipped effect is also designed to work in tandem with this and allows you to constantly and slowly regain a small amount of Health. This can be very handy for defensive builds.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Verdant_Glow_Spirit.md', within the main section titled 'Verdant Glow Spirit', specifically from the subsection 'Verdant Glow Spirit'.
The content is as follows:
Verdant Glow's Spirit allows you to turn into a small sapling and slowly regain Health. If you activate tree-mode in water, you gain even more Health. The equipped effect is also designed to work in tandem with this and allows you to constantly and slowly regain a small amount of Health. This can be very handy for defensive builds.
